name: AFA – Mobile-Ready Submission Manager
author: claudionhangapc, marciogoes

sections.description:
AFA – Mobile-Ready Submission Manager is powerful WordPress plugin designed to enhance your form management experience. Our plugin simplifies form entry management, providing you with the tools to streamline the process and save time.
Our plugin goes beyond the desktop, offering a robust API that empowers your mobile app users to effortlessly view form submissions on the go through the AFA Mobile App. Seamlessly integrate our plugin with popular WordPress form builders, granting your users the ability to oversee submissions from anywhere.
Stay organized, gain insights, and enhance user interactions, all within your WordPress dashboard and through our dedicated API. With our user-friendly plugin, you can maintain control and transform how you manage form submissions. Dive into the possibilities today and revolutionize your approach to form management.

GET IT ON GOOGLE PLAY

Here is step by step guide

PLUGIN FEATURES

  • Mobile APP
  • Real-time notifications
  • Work with contact form 7 + contact form 7 db, Elementor’s Form Builder, GravityForms, WPForms and weForms
  • Add none admin user ability to oversee submissions from anywhere
sections.installation:
You can install the plugin by following these steps:
1. Navigate to the “Plugins” section in your WordPress admin dashboard.
2. Click on the “Add New” button.
3. Search for “AFA – Mobile-Ready Submission Manager” and click “Install Now”.
4. Once the installation is complete, click “Activate” to enable the plugin.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin support popular form builders like Contact Form 7 and WPForms?

Yes, our plugin seamlessly integrates with popular WordPress form builders, including Contact Form 7, WPForms, GravityForms, weForms and more. We are continually working to expand our integrations to include additional form builders as well.

Is it necessary to install any extra plugins for this plugin to operate alongside Contact Form 7?

Yes, to use this plugin for Contact Form 7, you will need to have the Flamingo plugin installed and activated. Flamingo is used to store and manage form submissions generated by Contact Form 7.

Is the plugin compatible with the latest version of WordPress?

Yes, we regularly update our plugin to ensure compatibility with the latest version of WordPress. We recommend keeping both your WordPress and the plugin updated to benefit from the latest features and security enhancements.
